name: OrderItemTerm
comment: This entity contains the terms associated with the shopping cart item like 12 Months commitment term.
vf short description: This entity contains the terms associated with the shopping cart item like 12 Months commitment term.

fields.name: OrderItemTermSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: OrderItemTermKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for each Order Item term in aLDM. Generated Key based on Order Item Id, Order Item Term Name

fields.name: OrderItemSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderItemId
fields.comment: Indicates the order item id. ProductOrder.orderItem.id

fields.name: OrderItemTermName
fields.comment: Indicates the term name like 12 Months. ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.name

fields.name: OrderItemTermDesc
fields.comment: Description of the product order commitment term ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.description

fields.name: OrderItemTermDuration
fields.comment: Indicates the term duration like 12 Months ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.duration.amount

fields.name: OrderItemTermDurationUomInd
fields.comment: Indicates the UOM of the term duration ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.duration.units

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Indicates the effective date of the order item term. ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.validFor.startDateTime

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the end date of the order item term. ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.validFor.endDateTime

fields.name: OrderItemTermFreezeDate
fields.comment: Date on which the commitment was frozen due to an action performed on the product ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.freezeDate

fields.name: OrderItemTermPolicyId
fields.comment: The ID of the term policy ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.policyId

fields.name: OrderItemTermImpactType
fields.comment: Type of the impact on the term of the order item due to an action performed on the product ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.impactType

fields.name: OrderItemRemainingTermDuration
fields.comment: The remaining duration for order item term. ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.remainingDuration.amount

fields.name: OrderItemElapsedTermDuration
fields.comment: The elapsed duration for order item term. ProductOrder.orderItem.itemTerm.elapsedDuration.amount

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
